Question
========

Which formula describes the square of person effects ($SS_{persons}$) in a repeated measures ANOVA? 
Answerlist
----------
* $N*\sum(M_{Tj}-M_{grand})^{2}$
* $\sum(X_{ij}-M_{grand})^{2}$
* $\sum(X_{ij}-M_{PiTj})^{2}$
* $k*\sum(M_{Pi}-M_{grand})^{2}$

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
